SELECT EXISTS( SELECT * FROM tbl_exchange A JOIN tbl_order B ON A.order_code = B.order_code JOIN tbl_franchise C ON B.franchise_code = C.franchise_code JOIN tbl_franchise_member D ON B.franchise_code= D.franchise_code JOIN tbl_member E ON D.member_code = E.member_code WHERE A.exchange_code = #{ exchangeCode } AND E.id = #{ loginId } ) AS result;

SELECT A.order_code FROM tbl_order_item A JOIN tbl_item B ON A.item_code = B.item_code JOIN tbl_order C ON A.order_code = C.order_code JOIN tbl_franchise_member D ON C.franchise_code = D.franchise_code JOIN tbl_member E ON D.member_code = E.member_code WHERE A.available = 'AVAILABLE' AND E.id = #{ loginId } GROUP BY C.order_code HAVING COUNT(A.item_code) > 0;
